Prebon launches two missles the first intercepts Starlights charge 
and the second continues toward Starlight. Prebon speeds up his 
flight and flies in the direction of the falling bot. on the way he 
fires three more shots at Fenox. 

In an attempt at witty banter with Astral he keeps his comm 
open. "Troops are only as good as the bot in charge." He can't help 
to think how poorly these Alliance bots have performed in the battle. 
if it wasn't for the main gun the Trainers would probably be sitting 
in the command chair. "So far with what I know about your leader I 
fail to be surprised that you can't win."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Oh, that helps (not)!
> 
> ::Astral/Fenox/Starlight/Slayer/Havoc::
> 
> Astral's considers his choises for a second, but is then blown 
> backwards by Prebon's missiles. He growls, muttering an order into 
> his comm and jumping up, firing at Prebon.
> 
> "I have three troops, you only have one!"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Fenox recieves Astral's order, flying down after the new bot, 
gaining 
> on him to catch him. Two shots whizz by her, recieving little 
> attention.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Starlight regains balance in the air, flying up and barely avoiding 
> all of Prebon's shots but one. She regains her balance again, 
firing 
> at Prebon with her charge launcher.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer's scanners pick up Iguanus, exactly 20000 leagues under him. 
> He takes in a long breath, diving into the water.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Havoc swears as Slayer dives. He changes direction, plunging into 
the 
> water after Slayer.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Ignatius went down into the water when his systems locked up from 
> the 
> > blast, he's probably about 20,000 leagues under the sea singing 
> with 
> > the fishes.
> > 
> > Prebon takes off after Starlight knowing that reinforcements 
would 
> be 
> > coming soon. without Blaze's disruptor communications was once 
> again 
> > possible. As he lifted off he was hit by various shots from 
Astral 
> > slowing down his liftoff. The trainer leader opened a link to his 
> > assailant. "You have a choice to make, either keep attacking me 
and 
> > lose your prize or go catch it. What would your mighty leader say 
> if 
> > you lost the bot that your friend was carrying?" He already knew 
> the 
> > answer so he didn't expect a reply. He let his weapons do the 
> talking 
> > and fired two missles at Astral and five more blasts from his 
> rifle, 
> > three at Starlight and two at the new bot. (Ruthless ain't I)
